data.title: Shariq Shah - Chief Executive Officer & Founder at Tutorly.ai
data.meta_description: Shariq Shah has extensive work experience in various roles within the technology industry.
data.text:
Shariq Shah has extensive work experience in various roles within the technology industry. Shariq is currently the Chief Executive Officer and Founder of Tutorly.ai, a position they have held since January 2023. Prior to that, Shariq served as the Chief Executive Officer of Launchvisory, starting in January 2020. At Launchvisory, they worked closely with founders in the idea to pre-seed stage, helping them design, build, launch, and grow their software companies. Shariq specialized in building revenue-generating, investor-ready products.

Shariq also held the role of Technology Advisor at Streo since January 2023. Previously, they served as the Chief Product Officer and Technical Lead at PushTok from June 2020 to present, and also worked as an Advisor for the same company during that time. Prior to their roles at PushTok, Shariq was the Chief Executive Officer of Ambii Inc. from September 2016 to October 2022. Shariq also worked as the Startup Accelerator Program Manager at San Jose State University from January 2020 to July 2021, and as an Integration Engineer at Host Analytics Inc. from May 2015 to December 2016.

Additionally, Shariq has experience as a Software Engineering Lead at NASA Ames NuLEAF Technologies from July 2015 to July 2016, where they led a small team in developing nano-simulation software. Shariq also served as the Project Lead for the San Jose Public Library Privacy Project from February 2015 to June 2015, leading a team in building a prototype for the library's website.

Early in their career, Shariq worked as a Software Engineering Intern at Gracenote from November 2013 to June 2014, where they developed multiple use-case Android mobile applications using the GraceNote API.

Shariq Shah has a Bachelor of Science degree in Computer Science from San Jose State University.
